capabilities.name: gad-app-about
capabilities.description: Get and check information about GAD application (check base status of GAD application)

capabilities.name: gad-app-healthcheck
capabilities.description: Get healthcheck from GAD application (base healthcheck of GAD application)

capabilities.name: gad-app-dbcheck
capabilities.description: Get healthcheck for data base for GAD application.

capabilities.name: gad-app-restore-list
capabilities.description: Get restore GAD application DB endpoints list.

capabilities.name: gad-app-api-json-schema
capabilities.description: Get JSON openAPI swagger schema for REST API for GAD application.

capabilities.name: gad-app-config-all
capabilities.description: Get all config configuration from GAD application.

capabilities.name: gad-app-bugs-all
capabilities.description: Get all bugs configuration from GAD application.

capabilities.name: gad-app-features-all
capabilities.description: Get all features configuration from GAD application.

capabilities.name: gad-app-generic-get-rest-api
capabilities.description: Generic GET request to GAD application REST API.

capabilities.name: gad-app-generic-post-rest-api
capabilities.description: Generic POST request to GAD application REST API.
